caption.title: Overlapping outbreaks of chikungunya, dengue, and Zika viruses.
caption.p: During 2016â€“2017, 36 countries reported local cases of chikungunya, dengue, and Zika viruses; more, such as Cuba, Haiti, and Suriname, likely had transmission of all three viruses, but they were not reported. The inserts are examples of synergistic outbreak dynamics, shown as reported cases per month. All data were obtained from the Pan-American Health Organization and are available at https://github.com/grubaughlab/paper_2019_co-infection.
